channel.display-name: Court TV Mystery (WCZU-LD6) Bowling Green, KY

programme.title: Comment on Kentucky
programme.desc: Journalists from various locations in Kentucky discuss the news of the day.

programme.title: Washington Week
programme.desc: The panel will discuss the challenges the president faces getting agreement within his party on paying for the bipartisan infrastructure bill and whether he can get progressives and moderates on board with plans.

programme.title: Great Performances
programme.desc: Go inside the mind of a genius as host Scott Yoo and fellow musicians undertake a recording of Beethoven's most personal music at a historic Berkshires manor to explore the composer's brilliant career where they are visited by some unexpected guests.

programme.title: Walk Together Children: The 150th Anniversary of the Fisk Jubilee Singers
BBC World News
programme.desc: A report on the day's international news from BBC correspondents around the globe.

programme.title: Kentucky Health
programme.desc: Nick Abedi, M.D., a vascular surgeon with Fayette Surgical Associates, talks about life-saving surgical solutions for carotid artery disease.

programme.title: Woodsongs
programme.desc: The Chuck Wagon Gang showcase their simple, yet distinctive style of sound. The Small Glories perform.

programme.title: Amanpour and Company
programme.desc: In-depth conversations with global thought leaders and cultural influencers.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Grab your tissues for an emotional special episode full of guests who wear their hearts on their sleeves. Standouts include an 1888 Joseph Nawahi oil, a Navajo Ute First Phase blanket, and a Gambrinus beer stein.

programme.title: Father Brown
programme.desc: Oliver interrupts Alexander and Lucy's dance practice, telling Alexander that if he wins the ballroom dance competition, he'll tell him who took his sight.

programme.title: The Chavis Chronicles
programme.desc: Dr. Chavis goes beyond the headlines offering insights on matters that impact the public.

programme.title: Woodsmith Shop
programme.desc: Experienced woodworkers demonstrate how to build new projects.

programme.title: Mister Rogers' Neighborhood
programme.desc: Betty Aberlin's friend Mary teaches children games and songs. A flying turkey delivers a message.

programme.title: Arthur
programme.desc: D.W. gets the hiccups and can't find the right cure; Buster waits for Brain to make a mistake.

programme.title: The Cat in the Hat Knows a Lot About Halloween!
programme.desc: The Cat in the Hat takes Nick and Sally on the craziest Halloween ride filled with howlers and shockers and scary fandangles, big laughs and music and fun from all angles.

programme.title: Curious George: A Halloween Boo Fest
programme.desc: George is excited to spend his first Halloween in the country. When Bill tells George and Allie a spooky tale about a scarecrow that haunts the countryside, the two pals set out to get a photo of the fearsome creature.

programme.title: Wild Kratts
programme.desc: The Wild Kratts aren't too sure what to do for Halloween. Martin and Chris don't realize that Zach and the other villains have come up with a plan to ruin Halloween.

programme.title: Paint This With Jerry Yarnell
programme.desc: Jerry guides students through fine-art techniques that can be practiced at home.

programme.title: Best of the Joy of Painting
programme.desc: Snow-covered landscape, icy pond and cabin, compliments of Bob Ross.

programme.title: Best of Sewing With Nancy
programme.desc: Mary Mulari, Sewing With Nancyâ€™s most frequent guest, joins Nancy Zieman to teach you to sew creative gifts for everyone. Nancy and Mary inspire you to use repurposed meaningful fabric for your heartfelt creations.

programme.title: Fons & Porter's Love of Quilting
programme.desc: Debi Kuennen-Baker translates the design of a Hawaiian-inspired quilt to a pillow.

programme.title: P. Allen Smith's Garden Home
programme.desc: Join P. Allen Smith as he learns a thing or two from gardeners, chefs and designers who are leading the pack in their field and are anything but traditional.

programme.title: Garden Smart
programme.desc: Horticultural experts from across the United States share their knowledge and gardening experience.

programme.title: Rick Steves' Europe
programme.desc: Discover Viking history, look at crown jewels in the palace, and visit the Tivoli Gardens carnival.

programme.title: Samantha Brown's Places to Love
programme.desc: A kayak tour in Everglades National Park and a Naples Zoo at Caribbean Gardens visit are featured.

programme.title: Travelscope
programme.desc: Experts take viewers around the world to see some fascinating natural treasures.

programme.title: Steven Raichlen's Project Smoke
programme.desc: Join Steven Raichlen for his most exciting live fire cooking adventures.

programme.title: Lidia's Kitchen
programme.desc: Lidia prepares corn and zucchini minestra, sweet and savory polenta cacio e pere and grilled corn, apricots, and protobellos.

programme.title: Pati's Mexican Table
programme.desc: Pati meets the young chefs and owners of one of Guadalajara's most exciting new restaurants, Xokol, where they are reconnecting with their roots and using heritage corn to create a menu full of delicious dishes.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen From Cook's Illustrated
programme.desc: The test cooks prepare pan-seared salmon steaks and Brussels sprout salad with warm mustard vinaigrette.

programme.title: Cook's Country From America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: All the best recipes, testings and tastings featured in 'Cook's Country' magazine.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Grab your tissues for an emotional special episode full of guests who wear their hearts on their sleeves. Standouts include an 1888 Joseph Nawahi oil, a Navajo Ute First Phase blanket, and a Gambrinus beer stein.

programme.title: The Lawrence Welk Show
programme.desc: From polkas to waltzes, from big band to country, the timeless music lives on.

programme.title: Tim Farmer's Country Kitchen
programme.desc: Tim Farmer explores traditional food preparation including gardening tips, canning, processing and smoking meat, where to purchase produce, and more. He also visits with folks who have a passion to share and enjoy recipes.

programme.title: The Red Green Show
programme.desc: Ranger Gord is missing from his tower; Red does the ultimate van conversion.

programme.title: Kentucky Life
programme.desc: A showcase of local Kentucky events, people and places.

programme.desc: A showcase of the best fishing, hunting and wildlife-related recreation in Kentucky.

programme.title: Mystic Pizza
programme.desc: Three waitresses share their romantic trials while they are working at a pizza parlour.

programme.title: Austin City Limits
programme.desc: Delight in the throwback country music of Brandy Clark and Charley Crockett. Nashville-based hit songwriter Clark performs cuts from her highly acclaimed Your Life is a Record. Lone Star native Crockett plays tunes from his album Music City U.S.A.

programme.title: Songs at the Center
programme.desc: Grammy Award winner Suzy Bogguss ('Letting Go'), Robin August ('Monster'), Alice Wallace ('The Same Old Song'), and hosted by singer-songwriter Eric Gnezda.

programme.desc: Buster's Uncle Bob tells him a spooky bedtime story about an encounter with a mysterious creature called the lycanbunny. Cheikh is worried that if he and his family become American citizens, then they will have to abandon their Senegalese culture.
